mapper.select: select m.member_idx from members as m join password_members as p on m.member_idx = p.member_idx where m.member_id = #{memberId} and p.password_member = #{passwordMember}
mapper.insert: insert into members(member_id, member_nickname, member_email, member_zonecode, member_address, member_address_detailed) VALUE(#{memberId}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberZonecode}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberAddressDetailed});
